game.name: UNBEATABLE
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: UNBEATABLE은 음악이 불법이자 범죄인 세상에서 벌어지는 리듬 어드벤처 게임입니다. 도망자인 비트와 그녀의 밴드와 함께 감성 넘치는 시나리오와 어우러진 완벽한 아케이드풍 리듬 게임을 즐기세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: UNBEATABLE is a rhythm adventure where music is illegal and you do crimes. Follow the story of Beat and her band on the run, in a narrative experience full of big emotions powered by arcade-flawless rhythm gameplay.

reviewHighlights.text: Never ever stop making things. Even if the world says it's bad. Even if you think it's messy or imperfect. Whatever feelings you've been holding on to...
So I backed this game on Kickstarter, and honestly I was soooo into the idea. A rhythm game done in a very studio trigger art style, with a really gre...
